mapper.update: UPDATE t_announcement SET del_status = 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE id = #{announcementId}
mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, announcement_title AS announcementTitle, announcement_content AS announcementContent, ta.create_time AS publishTime, tu.real_name AS publisherName FROM t_announcement ta LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ta.publisher_id = tu.id AND tu.del_status = 0 WHERE ta.del_status = 0 AND ta.id = #{announcementId}
